articles.author: Stephen Council
articles.title: Bay Area tech giant Intel's new CEO confirms layoffs, orders more in-office days - SFGATE
articles.description: Intel, led by new CEO Lip-Bu Tan, announced that it's laying off staff and tightening its return-to-office rule as the Bay Area giant tries to right its course.
articles.content:
The Intel logo outside the Santa Clara, Calif., headquarters of the chip company on Sept. 30, 2024.
Andrej Sokolow/Picture Alliance via Getty Images
In March, when Intel appointed new CEO Lip-Bu Ta… [+3702 chars]
